File Format: CN Reference (.ref)

DRAFT

This is a description of the contents of the copynumber reference file. The low-level formatting of the file is as a File5 file. (See the File5 docs for how these map into HDF5 objects.)

Unless otherwise noted, the columns are listed in the order they appear (0-based) and are double (H5T_STD_F64LE) values.

group: CN5

This group serves to group all the copynumber reference objects.

CN5/CN5.plier.feature-response

A File5_Tsv which list the plier feature responses by

  • probeset_id (colidx: 0) (datatype: int H5T_STD_I32LE)
  • one-column-per-CEL-file (colidx: 1 to N) (datatype: double / H5T_STD_F64LE)

CN5/CN5.plier.snp-posteriors

These columns are listed in order they should appear. Except for the "probeset_id" column these are doubles.

  • id (colidx: 0) (datatype: 30-char string)
  • Cluster_AA_MeanStrength
  • Cluster_AA_Mean
  • Cluster_AA_Variance
  • Cluster_AA_VarianceStrength
  • Cluster_AB_MeanStrength
  • Cluster_AB_Mean
  • Cluster_AB_Variance
  • Cluster_AB_VarianceStrength
  • Cluster_BB_MeanStrength
  • Cluster_BB_Mean
  • Cluster_BB_Variance
  • Cluster_BB_VarianceStrength
  • Cross-Term_PAH
  • Cross-Term_PAB
  • Cross-Term_PHB

CN5/target-sketch

  • intensities (colidx: 0) (datatype: double)

CopyNumber

This groups the copynumber parameters.

CopyNumber/Parameters

A File5_Tsv with a single column used to store the parameters for the run.

  • Parameter (colidx: 0) (datatype: 1024-char string) This string is formatted like the TsvFile headers are. ("#%" KEY "=" VAL)

CopyNumber/Reference

  • probeset_id (colidx: 0) (datatype: 20-char string)
  • MedianSignal
  • XXMedianSignal
  • YMedianSignal
  • AAMedianSignal
  • ABMedianSignal
  • ABMedianSignal
